mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews ( id, user_id, room_id, rating, content, img_url, created_at ) VALUES ( seq_reviews.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{roomId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rating, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(r.rating), 1) AS avgRating, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM reviews r WHERE 1=1
AND r.room_id = #{roomId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT r.id, NVL(u.name, '익명') AS userName, r.room_id AS roomId, r.rating, CASE WHEN r.content IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(r.content, 4000, 1) END AS content, r.img_url AS imgUrl, TO_CHAR(r.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdAt FROM reviews r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.id = #{reviewId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
